txt.en:
'Greetings, [placeholder]. There are many Burglars who seek the Path of the Mischief Maker, but not all can accomplish their task alone. You should seek to aid your fellow Burglars along their path.

'The greatest danger your fellow will face is at the Sixteenth Hall.

'Go now and prove your honour.'
'You have done well, [placeholder]. You are truly a worthy Burglar-friend.'
'You should never turn away a fellow burglar in need...you should find out what he has to offer for your assistance!'
The Path of the Mischief Maker:  Lending a Hand
Many Burglars seek the Path of the Mischief Maker, but not all can accomplish their goals alone.
The Sixteenth Hall lies north from the Foundations of Stone and south of Sigin-Thar√¢k.\n\nHardsnel has instructed you to help a fellow Burglar complete his or her final task at the Sixteenth Hall.
Hardsnel is just outside the Sixteenth Hall, north of the Foundations of Stone.\n\nWith Unur slain, you should return to Hardsnel with news of your success.
